import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
df=pd.read_csv("../input/heights-and-weights/data.csv")
source.e9189254:
x=df.Height
y=df.Weight
x=df.iloc[:,0:1].values
y=df.iloc[:,1].values
m=1.2
c=2.1
y=m*x+c
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
MachineBrain=LinearRegression()
MachineBrain.fit(x,y)
